rooms.description: The entrance hall leads into the central courtyard and provides a welcoming space.
Large open-plan living area with exposed concrete finishes, following Brutalist aesthetics and Vastu principles for auspicious energy flow.
Open dining space adjoining the living room with natural lighting from a strategically placed window facing east, aligning with Vastu for health and prosperity.
Functional kitchen with ample storage, designed using raw materials consistent with Brutalist style, placed towards the south to benefit from morning sunlight as per Vastu.
Primary master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard. The layout supports privacy and natural ventilation.
En-suite bathroom for Bedroom 1 featuring minimalistic design and practical fixtures.
